fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Transport
eu_initiatives:
European Accessibility Act 
European Pillar of Social Rights  
European Solidarity Corps 
Cross-border healthcare directive
organisation_name: International Federation for Spina Bifida and Hydrocephalus (IF)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
IF is a member of  
European Patients Forum 
European Disability Forum (board membership) 
EURORDIS (board membership) 
International Disability Alliance (also Board membership) 
Food Fortification Initiative (also Board membership) 
 
IF holds a Special Consultative Status at the Economic and Social Council of the United Nations 
 
IF is a founding member of Child Help Belgium
relevant_communication:
IF event on healthcare for persons with disabilities home and abroad - will take place on 25.1. 2017 at the European Parliament 
 
Publication of two reports on access to healthcare - January 2017, based on data collection that ran in 2016 and had the Convention on Rights of Persons with Disabilities as its basis 
 
IF annual report
goals__remit: The mission of the International Federation for Spina Bifida and Hydrocephalus is to reduce the incidence of spina bifida and hydrocephalus by primary prevention and to improve the quality of life of people with SBH and their families through human rights education, political advocacy, research and community building.
